name: Space-Y
description:
The Musky Corporation is deeply committed to the future of the human species. That's why we need to build twenty space condos on Mars to establish a permanent colony away from Earth. Don't let your lack of experience piloting a multi-billion dollar rocket filled with as many people as we could cram in dissuade you. The Edison-1 comes equipped with a state of the art AI system that can maneuver through any tricky situation. This is going to be as easy as a soup sandwich.

Space-Y is a Lunar Lander type game with a few infuriating twists. Will you manage to build a viable Martian colony, or will you end up as just another debris field on the red planet? And how many people are you going to take with you?

Play the browser game for free, or leave a tip to download the offline version. If there's interest I will upgrade Space-Y with additional content, a configuration menu, and even more terrible ways to die. Remember that in space no-one can hear you scream, but Mars has a thin atmosphere so they can.
